entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • blazor wasm duplicated requests when using individual account auth #46658
  • Help Blazor users correctly setup the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web using directive #46657
  • Memory leak in Blazor Server InputFile #46656
  • SignalR test failures in release/6.0 #46651
  • Perf regression: fortunes #46650
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #46649
  • [RDG] Share indentation context for emitted strings #46643
  • [RDG] Optimize how EndpointFilterInvocationContext type is generated #46640
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [RDG] Support reading from `EmptyBodyBehavior` when processing `[FromBody]` attribute #46639
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor United #46636
  • #45577 also exists in .net 6 #46635
  • component dont update the changing value #46634
  • Enhance directory watch for shadow copy #46629
  • NullReferenceException in DefaultOutputFormatterSelector.ValidateContentTypes #46628
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Build with Error ASP0019,ASP0023 after retargeting to .NET 8.0 for OrchardCMS app #46642
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #46626
  • [RDG] Route handlers with the same parameters but differing nullability produce compiler warnings #46622

Closed

  • Blazor template tests timing out after https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/pull/45682 #46655
    Infrastructure
  • Support Int128 and UInt128 in API binding, ApiExplorer, etc. #43119
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ANCM Out-Of-Process random port range causes collision #46431
    8.0-preview2
  • Test Failure: BlazorServerTemplateWorks_NoAuth #30761
    8.0-preview2
  • upgrade 2.1 to 3.1 - Could not load type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.DataAnnotations.Internal.NumericClientModelValidatorProvider' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.DataAnnotations, Version=3.1.32.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' #46559
  • Blazor United feedback (it's good) #46292
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #46589
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #46614
  • Perf regression: json #46595
  • Perf improvement: mvc #46625
  • Kestrel gives 401 for large file uploads via POST request #46566
  • DOTNET_ROOT while running tests #46524
  • Blazor Playwright Tests StaticFiles Dependency #46430
    8.0-preview2
  • Flaky Various Blazor Template timeouts/failures #30882
    8.0-preview2
  • [chromium] [INFO:CONSOLE(1)] "Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token import", source: http://x.x.x.x_framework/blazor.webassembly.js (1) #46618
  • Error when run restore.sh or build.sh with vscode devcontainer #46598
  • Problem adding custom ClaimsPrincipalFactory when using roles #46593

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for parameter binding with [FromService] #46653
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #46646
    7.0.x
  • WIP: Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Add support for binding parameter with [FromBody] #46641
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46633
    area-grpc
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46624
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Add WaitForExit() back to ProcessEx.cs #46654
    8.0-preview2
  • Update SiteExtensions versions #46647
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭, 8.0-preview2
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #46645
    6.0.15
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues for token parsing #46623
    8.0-preview2
  • Framework.Tests: support running against Linux build artifacts. #46600
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • First pass at basic query string parameters. #46545
    8.0-preview2
  • Unify HTTP token parsing code #46580
    8.0-preview2
  • [release/7.0] Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46591
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.4

Updated

  • Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46577
    area-web-frameworks
  • Removing custom ProblemDetails Converters #46492
    area-web-frameworks
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update .npmrc approach and locked dependencies #46601
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
